fields.value:
Hanged Man
Attack: Basic
Defense: Basic scumshield

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Attack a playerâ€™s reflection, harming the player as well
- Increase your guard for the night, increasing your defense by one tier

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Attacks directed at you fail, while if another player attacks your target, they will attack you too (unless you are increasing your guard)
- If this role spawns, Jean Pierre Polnareff (4403) may not spawn naturally (they may still be created later in the game, however)
